name: tm47
effect: Teaches Steel Wing to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Low Sweep to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Steel Wing Gen I: Explosion)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Spreads hard-edged wings and slams into the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Spreads hard- edged wings and slams into the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user’s DEFENSE.
